influx.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the arrival of large numbers of people or large amounts of money, goods etc, especially suddenly
influx.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: a large influx of tourists in the summer
influx.translation[1].definitions[0].def: the arrival of large numbers of people, or large amounts of money, goods etc, especially suddenly
influx.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: In Frankfurt, stocks rose on an influx of foreign funds.
